page.title: 18 COUNTY CIVIC CENTRE
page.content: Located in Llwynegrin township.The complex (built during 1970's) comprises of the County Offices,Law Courts,County Library and Theatr Clwyd .The Educational Technology Centre and Harlech Television Studios are located in the latter.Clwyd's Capital Expenditure during 1983-4 was Â£15,165,651.Manpower for 1984. f-time p-time total Education 5702 5172 10874 Construction 109 - 109 Social Services 1043 996 2039 Libraries/Museums 188 148 336 Recreation,Baths 51 69 120 Planning 49 - 49 Central Services 1217 87 214 Consumer Prot. 44 - 44 Other Admin.Depts. 32 17 49 Technical Studies 271 172 443 ______ ______ _____ Totals] 8706 6661 15367
